name: Dagbani English Dictionary
desc: An app that users can search for the meaning of Dagbani words in English and the meanings of English words in Dagbani.

name: Dagbani Quran
desc: Get the Dagbani and English translation of the The Holy Quran from Arabic.

desc: A desktop image resizer app created with HTML, CSS and vanilla Javascript and run with Electron

desc: An advanced shopping cart with React Typescript

name: NotyStack Android
